section.title: An Enchanted Evening
section.p: Belle and the beast become close with one another, reading books from the grand library and talking together. They share a romantic evening together, eating dinner in a lovely dining room and then dancing in an enchanting ballroom. They both look ravishing, but Belle especially looks exquisite in a beautiful yellow.
